member.name: ICurrentWorkingDirectory.GetDirectory
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that, when this method returns successfully, receives the current working directory's fully qualified path as a null-terminated Unicode string.
The size of the buffer in Unicode characters, including the terminating NULL character.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICurrentWorkingDirectory.SetDirectory
member.param: A pointer to the fully qualified path of the new working directory, as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICurrentWorkingDirectory
member.summary: Exposes methods that enable a client to retrieve or set an object's current working directory.
